Name: Battle Mage : Card Caster
About the game: Battle Mage : Card Caster plunges you into card-based battles and a branching storyline. Ponder the morality of your choices and impact the events around you. Build your arsenal of spells to prevail over your enemies and all those that threaten your advance. Branching story Take the path you wish to follow and change your destiny. Decide what you want to achieve and who you want to be. Your choices have consequences, good and bad, immediate and distant, blatant and subtle. Card-based combat Build your spell book to prevail over your enemies. Discover and acquire new spells along the way. Find your fighting style and walk the victorious path.
